S.FORM: Maithripala Sirisena 9 bulad 3 demiad, Maithripala Sirisena, u misingkiway. 1951 a mihca nalecuhan) u tabakiay a tapang nu kanatal (congtung) nu Sri lanka ayza sa ci Maithripala Sirisena, micakat a demiad sa i 2015 a mihca 1 bulad 9 demiad. malalitin tu ihekalay atu zumaay a natinengan List of current heads of state and government
